title: House of Fraser discount codes: £50 off Michael Kors bags and more ways to save at the luxury department store
text:
High street one-stop-shop House of Fraser is a haven for shoppers keen to get all their fashion, household and electrical goods all in one place.
But if you're looking to find the best bargains in-store and online, we've put together some simple steps to follow that will help you on your way all year round.
The luxury department store has also launched an autumn-winter 2015 event this week, with £50 selected coats, bags and boots .
We love this Barbour Cavalary Polarquilt Jacket (£40 off) and this Michael Kors Dillon Black Tote Bag (£110 off).
How can I find the best offers? If you're on the hunt for savings from House of Fraser you should start by scouring their current offers section online and sales sections . They've got a clearance section online all year round, so whatever you're after, from a new kettle to bedding, be sure to check reduced warehouse first.
If you're looking to save on all your fashion, tech and household must-haves then the current fashion and home clearance event event is where to start your search.
Top deals in the fashion and home clearance event Half price furniture and bedding Get your home winter-ready on a budget this autumn
In their last chance to buy sale, you can get 50% off furniture for the whole house and up to 70% off home accessories including bedding, decorations and dining sets, from £1.
Cheap Michael Kors bags and 70% off fashion Treat yourself or kick start your Christmas shop with 50% off this Michael Kors gem
We've also spotted up to 70% off on mens and ladies fashion, 50% off designer handbags and accessories, including this Michael Kors Hamilton Black Large Zip Top Tote Bag , now £190 (from £240).
50% off beauty, gift sets and fragrance Cosy nights in: This cashmere bath collection is less than a fiver
There are some fab savings on beauty, including Christmas gift sets, with clearance deals on make up, skincare and fragrances .
This Baylis & Harding Boudoire Pink Orchid, Cashmere & Vanilla Set is now £4.50, and for a designer gem, this Moschino Pink Bouquet Bath Gel 200ml is now £13.50, from £27.
Half price Dyson and coffee machines Getty Cheap coffees for life? Yes please
Popular household electrical brands like Russell Hobbs coffee machines and Dyson are also featured. This Russell Hobbs Buckingham Coffee Maker is now £37.99 and you can now save £100 on this upright Dyson vacuum cleaner .
There are also great savings on items featured in House of Fraser's eBay shop , which includes furniture and home accessories as well as clothing.
How to save on delivery charges house of fraser Spend over £50 and get free delivery from House of Fraser
More ways to save at House of Fraser
The easiest way to avoid costly delivery charges is by opting for a free store click and collect on your order.
But if you do really need a delivery it is free on UK orders over £50, or £3.
Full delivery details can be found here .
Reward points, student discount and AMEX offers Regular House of Fraser shopper? You can maximise your savings by joining up to the store's Recognition reward card .
The loyalty points system allows you to earn one point for every £1 spent online or in-store and for every 500 collected you'll get £5 to spend.
As well as access to exclusive discounts, events and offers, students can get an extra 10% off at the luxury department store all year round through Unidays .
American Express card members can also snag some extra savings via the credit card's Amex offers , which is currently offering £10 statment credit to customers who spend £70 or more at House of Fraser until 1 November.
Full details on how you can redeem those savings here .
Use online voucher sites Getty Search voucher sites for extra discounts
A number of voucher sites feature House of Fraser's latest discount deals.
It is worth checking voucher code websites like Voucherbox , Savoo , a nd HotUKDeals regularly for up to the minute discount codes and deals .
Don't miss the deals: stay in the loop Avoid missing out: Stay connected
Another way to ensure you get the best deals making sure you know the latest House of Fraser news.
Check the in-house blog , sign up to the newsletter and download the app for Apple or Android .
Don't forget to also follow their social media channels like Facebook and Twitter .
For more deals, discounts and flash sales gossip, see our deals page.
